servinfo.title: Turbocharger Electric Water Pump Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Drain cooling system referring to Cooling System Components:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove turbocharger electric water pump referring to Cooling System Components:For Diesel Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Turbocharger Electric Water Pump Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Refilling:For Diesel Engine Model .
Check cooling system leakage referring to Engine Cooling System Inspection and Cleaning:For Diesel Engine Model .
